import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import Validate from './../libs/validate'; import pic01 from './../images/pic_1.jpg'; import {actSubmit,actChangeNotify} from './../actions/index'; import * as config from './../constants/Config'; class Form extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { number: 6 }} handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({number: event.target.value}); } handleSubmit = (event) => { let number = this.state.number; if(Validate.checkNum(number)===true){ this.props.handleSubmit(number); } else if (Validate.checkNum(number)===false || number < 3 && number > 12){ alert('Value input must be from 3 to 12 and a Number') } event.preventDefault(); } render() { let {numberSelected} = this.props; let number = this.state.number let notify = this.props.notify; console.log(notify) return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { numberSelected: state.numberSelected, notify: state.notify } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch,ownProps) => { return { handleSubmit: (number) => { dispatch(actSubmit(number)) }, changeNotify: (content) =>{ dispatch(actChangeNotify(content)) } } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Form)
